mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pi_info ( ID, professional, pi_photo_path, senior_title_certificate_path, senior_title_appointment_path, signed_resume_path, qualification_certificate_path, practice_certificate_path, gcp_certificate_path, shanchang, clinical_participation, clinical_reason, clinical_root_path ) VALUES ( #{Id}, #{professional}, #{piPhotoPath}, #{seniorTitleCertificatePath}, #{seniorTitleAppointmentPath}, #{signedResumePath}, #{qualificationCertificatePath}, #{practiceCertificatePath}, #{gcpCertificatePath}, #{shanchang}, #{clinicalParticipation}, #{clinicalReason}, #{clinicalRootPath} )
mapper.select: SELECT ID, professional, pi_photo_path, senior_title_certificate_path, senior_title_appointment_path, signed_resume_path, qualification_certificate_path, practice_certificate_path, gcp_certificate_path, shanchang, clinical_participation, clinical_reason, apply_status, current_step, submit_time, pi_info_id FROM pi_info WHERE ID = #{id} AND pi_info_id = #{piInfoId} LIMIT 1
